<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">But under the <choice>
            <sic>celing</sic>
            <corr>ceiling</corr>
          </choice>, on the seats, there were gentlemen,</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">and noblemen, men versed in Latin and Greek; scholars,</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">courtiers, statesmen. Their silence was equally profound.</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">But their influence was also effective. ThxmxBaconsxxmxmx</l>

<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"><rs type="literary-work" ref="../resources/annotations.xml#lit-stra" key="Elizabeth and Essex">Elizabeth and Essex</rs> and <rs type="person" ref="../resources/annotations.xml#psn-fbac" key="Bacon, Francis">Bacon</rs> found what suited them too</l>
